name: A Tale of Monsters
description:
Change the life of 7 monster characters and help them achieve their dreams.

Explore the isle of Lemuria and uncover its secrets.

  • 2 gathering classes
  • 3 crafting classes
  • 2 combat classes

All characters/classes will be interdependent and equally important to progress through the game.
